title: Did Rudy Giuliani call "the trial by fighting" before Trump broke into the Capitol?
subtitle: After a violent crowd landed on the American Capitol building, Trump's replacement speech was scrutinized.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The personal lawyer of President Donald Trump of the United States, Rudy Giuliani, called for a "battle trial" before the violent mob of Trump supporters broke into the American Capitol.
